channel.title: Mobile Apps on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile Apps on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Android Presentation Patterns: MVI
item.description: MVI isn’t a single ready-to-implement pattern; it’s more of a spectrum. This post delves into its diverse range, from basic MVVM patterns to intricate Redux-like state management, emphasizing the importance of grasping its principles for effective implementation tailored to specific project needs.
